Xu Zhang

MPhil Candidate
Computer Science,
The University of Hong Kong
xvzhang@connect.hku.hk


Biography

I am Xu Zhang, a CS student at the University of Hong Kong. My supervisors are Professor Hing-Fung Ting and Professor Tak-Wah Lam.

Prior to that, I was very lucky to work with Professor Chu-Xia Deng at University of Macau as a research assistant on Cancer Informatics.

I received B.S. in Biology Science from Shanxi Agricultural University.

My research interests lie in Machine Learning, Multi-omics, Cancer Bioinformatics, and Single Cell Sequencing.

News

[10/2023] Our paper for the tool MulMarker was accepted by BIBM, and I will have an oral presentation this December

[06/2023] Our paper of identifying a genome-instability related prognostic signature for lung adenocarcinoma was published in Frontiers in Cell and Developmental Biology

[03/2022] Our collaborative work was published in Nature Communications

[11/2021] Our collaborative work was published in Advanced Science

[09/2021] I was admitted by the University of Hong Kong with a full scholarship

[10/2021] Our collaborative work was published in Theranostics

    [07/2017] I graduated as an Outstanding Graduate, an honor selected from over 800 students for 10 individuals

    Experiences

  • MPhil Student
    The University of Hong Kong | Sep 2021 - Present
    • Developed a framework to identify potential multi-gene prognostic biomarkers
    • Identified a prognostic signature related to genome instability for lung adenocarcinoma patients
  • Research Assistant
    University of Macau | Jan 2019 - Jun 2021
    • Investigated divergent drug response in breast cancer, liver cancer and colon cancer
    • Investigated the mechanism of PARPi resistance in BRCA1-deficient mouse models using single-cell analysis
    • Explored the intra-tumor heterogeneity and temporal tumor evolution in breast cancer
  • Bioinformatics Engineer
    GENE Co. Ltd | Oct 2017 – Jan 2019
    • Developed and maintained tumor analysis toolkits
    • Developed graphical user interfaces (GUIs) for tumor analysis
    • Created local databases for internal staff to match mutations with drug responses
  • Visiting Student
    University of Georgia | Dec 2016 – Jun 2017
    • Investigated the differences in OGT and OGA between tumor cells and normal cells
  • Leader of UTIEP
    Shanxi Agricultural University | Sep 2014 – Jul 2017
    • Established fibroblast cell lines from Guangling Donkey

    • Teaching Experience

    • TA, COMP7409: Machine Learning in Trading and Finance (Spring 2023)
